properties.description: Disabled access, open to all ages, child friendly.; Offering: hot drinks, cuppa soup.; There is also a friendship group for older residents from 10am to 11am on a Tuesday morning at the same location.

hours._text: Open Tuesdays from 12pm to 2pm from 13 December 2022

properties.title: Ascension Church, Peacehaven

properties.address: Youth Centre, Denton Island Community Centre, Newhaven, BN9 9BA
properties.description: Disabled access, open to all ages, child friendly. ; Offering: hot drinks, snacks, hot meals e.g. soup, free Wi-Fi, activities, advice leaflets and signposting, social activities, befriending opportunities, drop-in sessions around digital exclusion, saving money on your energy bills, home safety checks done by the fire service and more.; The SCDA Community Navigators are available who can help people with issues around housing, debt, homelessness, benefits etc and signpost them to the right support. This is a free service.; The Community Cafe is open to everyone in the Community from 1.30-3pm after the Community Supermarket has finished. The Community Supermarket supports people with accessing affordable food on a Pay-As-You-Feel basis. There is also a Community Fridge and Community Kitchen on site.; The cafe is also open on Thursdays in Peacehaven from 1.30pm to 3pm at Kempton House, Cavell Avenue, Peacehaven, BN10 7NJ.
properties.title: Denton Island Community Cafe, Newhaven

properties.address: The Old Parcel Room Community Hub, Bishopstone Station, Station Road, Bishopstone, BN25 2RB
properties.description:
Disabled access but no disabled parking, open to all, children must be accompanied by a responsible adult. Awaiting installation of baby changing facility.; Offering: hot drinks, snacks, free Wi-Fi, second hand book swap, plus occasional discussion groups on local history, advice sessions and similar, leaflets and signposting.; 'Meet up Mondays' aims to combat social isolation and build resilience within the Bishopstone community.
; If driving, please use the Buckle car park and come via the back steps to the platform and over the footbridge. Better still, walk, cycle, or come by train. The nearest bus stop is Hill Rise.

hours._text: Open every Monday from 10am to 1pm (closed on bank holidays).

properties.title: Friends of Bishopstone Station, Bishopstone

properties.address: Denton Island Community Centre, Denton Island, Newhaven, BN9 9BA
properties.description: For parents and carers with children under four years old, disabled access. ; Offering: hot drinks, snacks, free Wi-Fi, free play, sensory and music activities, advice, leaflets and signposting.

Giggles Toddler Group (booking required): Thursday 10am to 11.30am Lunch Club (pre-book - small charge):4th Friday of month 12.30pm to 2pm Trained welcomers can signpost to relevant advice and support: Fegans Child Counselling: Tuesdays and Thursdays 9am to 4pm Foodbank & Advocacy Service: Wednesdays 10am to 12 noon.
